scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && pnpm typedef
scripts.ci:publish: pnpm build && pnpm publish --recursive --access=public && changeset tag
scripts.ci:release-electron: pnpm i --force && cross-env TRIPLEX_TARGET=electron pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && pnpm --filter @triplex/electron release
scripts.clean:node_modules: rimraf node_modules && pnpm -r exec rimraf node_modules
scripts.electron:build: cross-env TRIPLEX_TARGET=electron pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && pnpm --filter @triplex/electron build-target
scripts.electron:build-targets: cross-env TRIPLEX_TARGET=electron pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && pnpm --filter @triplex/electron build-targets
